about_the_game:
This is a story-driven game taking place many hundred years into the past. Take control of a young man Alkey who wants to become a brave warrior. Be ready for journey across diverse regions, fight hordes of thugs, meet different characters, gather your team of bold warriors, take part in epic battles, conquer strongholds, face with powerful invaders.

Combat

Defeat your enemies with various types of ancient weapons: swords, spears, axes, bows, darts, slings and other. There are a huge variety of potential playstyles. Engage in close combat or shoot enemies with multiple arrows.

Epic battles

Participate in large scale real-time epic battles together with your allies and featuring dozens of warriors.

Lead your warriors

Hire warriors to your team. Lead them into battle and give orders. Improve skills to hire more warriors. Rush straight into the middle of the battle and fight alongside your troops or let your warriors do all the work for you.

Travel to an ancient country

Start a journey through 4 large islands available in this ancient dangerous world. Explore cities, settlements, fortresses, dark dungeons, lush forests and expanses of the ancient world.

Thrilling adventure

Complete missions and progress through the story full of different adventures, characters and events. Help the main character protect people from angry thugs and an army of cryptic invaders.

short_description: Alkey the Brave is an action adventure game with a focus on dynamic battles. Go through an exciting adventure in ancient time, fight hordes of thugs, struggle with cruel tyrants, gather brave warriors under your banner and defeat cryptic invaders.
